plot: Follow the adventures of Jonathan Shaffer, an ex-Surrealist forced back into the fold for "one last surrealist job." A comedy about a man who must reconcile the normal person he has become ...
plot_es: Follow the adventures of Jonathan Shaffer, an ex-Surrealist forced back into the fold for "one last surrealist job." A comedy about a man who must reconcile the normal person he has become ...
plot_en: Follow the adventures of Jonathan Shaffer, an ex-Surrealist forced back into the fold for "one last surrealist job." A comedy about a man who must reconcile the normal person he has become ...
